sentences.en: But this week's hammer - blow will unleash waves of Schadenfreude.
sentences.cn: 但这周的重击引发了一股幸灾乐祸的浪潮.

sentences.en: Get out! Or I'll unleash my dog on you.
sentences.cn: 出去! 否则我放狗咬你.

sentences.en: Go at once, or I will unleash my dog on you!
sentences.cn: 立刻走, 要不我就放我的狗咬你!

sentences.en: GWT: Very soon I will unleash my fury, and my anger will destroy them.
sentences.cn: 吕震中本: 因为还有一点点短时候, 我的愤怒和怒气就要因他们的灭亡而止息.

sentences.en: He would have no qualms about using missiles to unleash a nuclear war.
sentences.cn: 他会毫无顾忌地利用火箭发动一场核战争.

sentences.en: Lefevre’s comments unleashed a wave of protest.
sentences.cn: 勒菲弗的评论引发了一波抗议的浪潮。

sentences.en: Now you have even more ways to enjoy your Sims experience and unleash your creativity!
sentences.cn: 现在你可以有更多方式去享受模拟人生和发挥你的创造力!

sentences.en: Teachers awaken young minds, and teachers encourage ingenuity and unleash fertile imaginations.
sentences.cn: 老师唤醒年轻头脑, 并且老师鼓励机巧和解开肥沃想像力.

sentences.en: That will unleash the kind of spending that needs to go on.
sentences.cn: 那将会解开～的类型皮带花费继续的需要.

sentences.en: The officers were still reluctant to unleash their troops in pursuit of a defeated enemy.
sentences.cn: 军官们仍不愿发兵乘胜追击溃败的敌人。

sentences.en: This is not only because of the economic damage that climate change will eventually unleash.
sentences.cn: 这不仅仅是因为气候变化最终将祸及经济.

sentences.en: Unleash all the advantages of Hainan Special Economic Zone!
sentences.cn: 发挥特区优势,做足“特”字文章!

sentences.en: Unleash the destruction and destroy everything in your path including the environments in huge game maps.
sentences.cn: 在毁灭地球的道路上“遇佛杀佛,遇父杀父”,甚至是巨大的游戏地图中的环境元素也可以被你摧毁.

sentences.en: Unleash the full powers by registering.
Unleash the tides of doom ! Appose all those who would oppose us.
sentences.cn: 掀起毁灭的潮流,反对所有将反对我们的人!

sentences.en: While the templar unleash fire and lightning, the dark templar stalk the shadows, swathed in darkness.
sentences.cn: 高级圣堂武士用火焰和闪电攻击, 而黑暗圣堂却能够潜行于阴影之中, 黑暗就是他们最好的朋友.

words.tran_cn: 不受约束；自由自在；放荡不羁
发动；解开…的皮带；解除…的束缚

trans.tran_en: to suddenly let a strong force, feeling etc have its full effect

trans.tran_cn: 解开…的皮带，放纵，解除…的束缚，发泄
